messages.body: Rightway Automotive Credit - Vandalia • 410 West National Rd • VanDalia, OH 45377 (937)280-0982 • www.rightway.com   02/07/26   Mackenzie Minnich 464 Heather Street Englewood, OH 45322    Greetings from Rightway Automotive Credit.   Today, there are great opportunities for auto financing at Rightway Automotive Credit - Vandalia. We have many different banks to finance you and we are looking to help you get into the vehicle of your choice. We also offer a credit restoration program to help you get on your way to better credit.    Here at Rightway we have a diverse stock, from vans and SUV's to small and medium size cars. We inspect all our vehicles with a 70-point inspection to make sure they are free from any safety defects. With every vehicle purchase we offer a 6 month/6,000 mile power-train service contract, and 1 year of 24/7 roadside assistance included.   When you sit at my desk I can offer you a no-obligation credit check, and I will work hard to get you into the car of your choice.   Please call me for an appointment today.  Sincerely,  Vince West Salesperson VWest@rightway.com
messages.subject: Great Auto Financing Opportunities
